div.p: Please click here to read a message about COVID-19.

a.title: 4:00 PM
a.span: HS Track All Conf Meet @ Eleva-Strum

p.span: Here is the menu plan for meals this week!

CONGRATULATIONS to Ari, Lauren K, Marlee & Lauren S for being selected as WFSCA Senior All-Stars. Congratulations, also, to Coach Bratina, who was selected to coach the all-star team. Unfortunately,...

Whoa! We had received a very special donation of cheese and butter from the Blair FFA Alumni a few weeks ago to distribute to families along with the meals. I thought I had provided some information...
We will be live streaming the school board meeting (5:30) and public hearing (7:00) on WildCat TV. We will also broadcast them on our cable station (881 or 18 - 81).

We are so grateful for the wonderful donations that have been made through the Curds for Kids program that provided cheese curds for our families last week and again this week. We are very fortunate...
Congratulations to Lauren Steien! She has been selected as one of only 32 students in the state as a WIAA Scholar Athlete. We believe that Lauren is only the third BT Wildcat to receive this...

Message from Superintendent Eide regarding food distribution: Hello everyone! The food pickup locations are being modified. The locations include the Taylor Community Center, Beach Corners, and the...
Mrs. Eide and Mrs. Gill present the 7-12 students of the month for March! Congratulations, students! Keep up the good work!

Please note there will be a school board meeting at 5:30 pm on Monday, April 27th, followed by a public hearing at 7:00 pm.
Due to the need for social distancing, members of the public cannot...

Will your child be 4 years old by September 1, 2020? If so, please use the following link to register your child for 4K. If you have questions regarding 4K or Head Start, please call the elementary...
Check out these pictures of a student working on an Earth Day project provided by the Early Learning Center!

Thank you to everyone who helped us to try to win a free visit from Jan Brett.
Blair-Taylor Elementary made it up to #25 on the list of front runners, with 186 votes. We have won a free...
Very proud of this young man! He has overcome many obstacles to get where he is today. Congratulations, Colyn! You are Blair-Taylor's Extra Effort Award recipient. See the article in the LaCrosse...

Today is the LAST DAY to make a submission on our behalf in the Jan Brett contest. If we can get into the top 10, we will win 10 Jan Brett books for our library. If we can get to first place, we win...
